Text: Blue Dolphin Pipe Line Company Contract No I am inquiring about the status of this contract This contract was forwarded to you on April for review and initial I need to know if you still have possession of this contract or who has possession of this contract I need to have this contract routed for signatures and returned to the counterparty Thank you Marlene Hilliard Forwarded by Marlene HilliardHOUECT on PM Marlene Hilliard PM To Daren J CT cc Subject

Oasis Pipe Line Companyhave three other contract which need to be terminated I have termination letters effective October Please let me know if there are any deals attached to these contracts before I terminate them in the system Please respond as soon as possible Marlene Hilliard

Re Oasis Pipe Line Companya note that the assignment and assumption agreement does not need to be executed but the amendments still need to be executed and returned to me Marlene Hilliard Forwarded by Marlene HilliardHOUECT on PM Marlene Hilliard PM To Daren J CT cc Subject Re Oasis Pipe Line Company Daren This is true I did not learn of this until Friday September However I still need to have the Oasis Contracts returned to me Please return them in interoffice mail Thanks so much Marlene D Hilliard Forwarded by Marlene HilliardHOUECT on PM Daren J Farmer PM To Marlene ct cc Subject Re Oasis Pipe Line Company Marlene After discussions with the desk we have decided to keep the Oasis contracts under ENA So we dont need to sign the contracts you sent earlier Let me know if you have any questions D Marlene Hilliard PM To Daren J CT cc Subject Oasis Pipe Line Company I need to know the status of these contracts I forwarded to you on August and August Marlene Hilliard

FW Meter Set Up Fac pst I have a correction I changed the pipe code but the system will not allow me to save because the meter no for PGTT already exist on Facility No Karl please contact me as soon as possible to discuss this matter Marlene D Hilliard Original Message From Hilliard Marlene Sent Friday August PM To Farmer Daren J Subject FW Meter Set Up Fac Per authorization fromDaren Farmer I have changed pipe code PGEV to PGTT The meter no will remain the same The Rate Zone is PGTT and the Trade Zone is TUFCO Should you have any further questions please do not hesitate to contact me Marlene D Hilliard Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESkdstewartaepEcom NRONcom Sent Friday August PM To Hilliard Marlene Subject Meter Set Up Fac Look thru the sequence history The Meter on the opposite side did not change even though the pipe code did That is all I have to suggest To Farmer Daren J cc Subject FW FW Meter Set Up Fac I need to get the approval from Daren Farmer ext Please feel free to contact him to discuss this matter Also I do not believe the meter no will be the same I searched PI Grid and it shows HPL with DRN interconnect with meter no DRN for Teco Pipeline Co We have discrepenciesisssues What verifying information do you have for this meter Marlene D Hilliard Ext Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESkdstewartaepEcom NRONcom Sent Friday August PM To Hilliard Marlene Subject Re FW Meter Set Up Fac I have already created a new sequence starting can you change the pipe code and other relavant info in the new sequence starting This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

FW Deal Cc This deal is for Global This is between HPL and Black Marlin Pipeline Company This should be handled by your group Thank you Original Message From Anderson Bridgette Sent Tuesday November PM To Hilliard Marlene Campos Sylvia A Subject FW Deal MarleneSylvia Please see message below pertaining to a Transport deal Original Message From Campos Anthony Sent Tuesday November PM To Anderson Bridgette Subject FW Deal From Darren Farmer Thank You Anthony Campos Enron CorpGlobal Contracts office fax pager mailto Original Message From Farmer Daren J Sent Tuesday November PM To Campos Anthony Subject FW Deal Anthony Can you take care of this Original Message From Farmer Daren J Sent Monday November PM To Campos Anthony Subject FW Deal Anthony Can you change the counterparty name on deal to Black Marlin Pipeline Company Inc D Original Message From Schumack Sherlyn Sent Monday November AM To Farmer Daren J Subject FW Deal Daren Will you let me know when this change has been made I need to get some payments finaled by pm tomorrow Original Message From Schumack Sherlyn Sent Thursday November PM To Farmer Daren J Subject RE Deal Prior to this was ENA not HPL but there may be some issues on it as well for to The deal ticket we used was I will have to look further into the ENA activity because I know we still have some invoices that were paid under one company and we still have drafts under the other Original Message From Farmer Daren J Sent Thursday November AM To Schumack Sherlyn Subject RE Deal This ticket starts with production How were all of the other months paid D Original Message From Schumack Sherlyn Sent Thursday November AM To Farmer Daren J Subject Deal Daren I am trying to get some payments out to Williams for old months and but global counterparty said this deal should have Black Marlin Pipeline Company Inc instead of Black Marlin Pipeline Company effective The Black Marlin Pipeline Company was for an internal record when it was an Enron entity

Eastern States Transportneed an agency agreement between ENA and American Refining Oil Gas This is creates a problem in order to set up the below listed contracts Please let me know about the agency agreement Thanks Marlene Hilliard Forwarded by Marlene HilliardHOUECT on PM Chris Germany PM To Brenda H CT Marlene ct cc Victor CT Molly CT Stephanie CT Subject Eastern States Transport Please set up the following contracts Pipeline Eastern States Oil Gas Inc Seller Eastern States Oil Gas Inc Buyer American Refining and Exploration Company Agent ENA Im East Global k Term evergreen We will change deal Pipeline Eastern States Oil Gas Inc Seller Eastern States Oil Gas Inc Buyer American Refining and Exploration Company Agent ENA Im East Global k Term evergreen We will change deal

Agency Agreementsanyone help me with these agency agreements Marlene Hilliard Forwarded by Marlene HilliardHOUECT on PM Marlene Hilliard AM To Scott NRON Chris CT Randall L CT Dan CT Elsa CT Daren J CT Kimberly S CT Kevin CT Judy CT cc Subject Agency Agreements All I am searching for a copy of an executed agency agreements for the following contracts If you are in possession of the executed agency agreement or know the contact person I can retrieve the executed agency agreement please forward the agency agreement to me or let me know the person to contact either at Enron North America Corp or the contact person for the shipper I need a response ASAP ENA agent for Counterparty Effective Date Pipeline KerrMcGee Corporation Venice Gathering Gathering System and TRANSCO Petsec Energy Inc Venice Gathering System LLC Devonian Resources Inc Somerset Gas Transmission Patrick Shipley Somerset Gas Transmission Devon Energy Corporation Reliant Energy Field Services Tenaska Gas Company TXU Gas Distribution City of Pasadena Pacific Gas Electric Company Allegheny Ludlum Corporation Columbia Gas Transmission Corporation Commonwealth Energy Inc Norse Pipeline LLC Columbia Energy Marketing Corporation TRANSCO CGAS and Dominion Transmission Inc Columbia Energy Marketing Corporation Midcoast Interstate Crescendo Energy LLC Wildhorse Energy Partners Enron Canada Corp TransCanada Pipelines Limited EPMI agent for West Fork Development Company Midwestern Gas Marketing West Fork Development Company Midwestern Gas Transmission Gleason Power I LLC ANR Pipeline Company Thanks for your assistance in this matter Marlene Hilliard

FW CGLF contractYes Chris I can draft a termination letter The termination notice period is months prior written notice to either party Let me know who it should be addressed to and I will draft the letter and forward it prior to December which will give the counterparty month prior written notice I will have to have it executed by the proper parties of course I will wait to hear from you Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Tuesday October PM To Ramirez Robert Cc Fletcher Brenda H Hilliard Marlene Subject CGLF contract Robert when you get a chance please give me all the service deal numbers for CGLF k Marlene the new termination date for this contract is If I have time I am going to send CGLF a termination notice for this contract effective Is that something you could do for me Let me know
FW CGLF kTour request is complete for Contract No Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Wednesday November PM To Hilliard Marlene Subject CGLF k CGLF contract has been extended to

FW CGLF contract Cc Attached is a copy of a termination letter Per the terms of the contract notice of termination should be months prior to termination Chris Germany has requested that this contract be terminated The termination letter should be routed to Gerald Nemec for review and redlining Then routed for review and initial to the Trader Chris Germany to Legal Gerald Nemec and then to the Vice President Scott Neal Contact Scott Neal through Kimberly Bates Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Friday November PM To Hilliard Marlene Subject FW CGLF contract Our contact for this is Janice Felton Her number is Please call her on Monday and let her know that ENA wishes to terminate contract effective Ask her what she needs in writing from us then draft it and send it to her attentions Thanks Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Tuesday October PM To Hilliard Marlene Subject RE CGLF contract I believe its Janice Felton but I will make sure Thanks Original Message From Hilliard Marlene Sent Tuesday October PM To Germany Chris Subject FW CGLF contract Yes Chris I can draft a termination letter The termination notice period is months prior written notice to either party Let me know who it should be addressed to and I will draft the letter and forward it prior to December which will give the counterparty month prior written notice I will have to have it executed by the proper parties of course I will wait to hear from you Original Message From Germany Chris Sent Tuesday October PM To Ramirez Robert Cc Fletcher Brenda H Hilliard Marlene Subject CGLF contract Robert when you get a chance please give me all the service deal numbers for CGLF k Marlene the new termination date for this contract is If I have time I am going to send CGLF a termination notice for this contract effective Is that something you could do for me Let me know

Agency AgreementsCan anyone help me with these agency agreements Marlene Hilliard Forwarded by Marlene HilliardHOUECT on PM Marlene Hilliard AM To Scott NRON Chris CT Randall L CT Dan CT Elsa CT Daren J CT Kimberly S CT Kevin CT Judy CT cc Subject Agency Agreements All I am searching for a copy of an executed agency agreements for the following contracts If you are in possession of the executed agency agreement or know the contact person I can retrieve the executed agency agreement please forward the agency agreement to me or let me know the person to contact either at Enron North America Corp or the contact person for the shipper I need a response ASAP ENA agent for Counterparty Effective Date Pipeline KerrMcGee Corporation Venice Gathering Gathering System and TRANSCO Petsec Energy Inc Venice Gathering System LLC Devonian Resources Inc Somerset Gas Transmission Patrick Shipley Somerset Gas Transmission Devon Energy Corporation Reliant Energy Field Services Tenaska Gas Company TXU Gas Distribution City of Pasadena Pacific Gas Electric Company Allegheny Ludlum Corporation Columbia Gas Transmission Corporation Commonwealth Energy Inc Norse Pipeline LLC Columbia Energy Marketing Corporation TRANSCO CGAS and Dominion Transmission Inc Columbia Energy Marketing Corporation Midcoast Interstate Crescendo Energy LLC Wildhorse Energy Partners Enron Canada Corp TransCanada Pipelines Limited EPMI agent for West Fork Development Company Midwestern Gas Marketing West Fork Development Company Midwestern Gas Transmission Gleason Power I LLC ANR Pipeline Company Thanks for your assistance in this matter Marlene Hilliard

Agency Agreementsanyone help me with these agency agreements Marlene Hilliard Forwarded by Marlene HilliardHOUECT on PM Marlene Hilliard AM To Scott NRON Chris CT Randall L CT Dan CT Elsa CT Daren J CT Kimberly S CT Kevin CT Judy CT cc Subject Agency Agreements All I am searching for a copy of an executed agency agreements for the following contracts If you are in possession of the executed agency agreement or know the contact person I can retrieve the executed agency agreement please forward the agency agreement to me or let me know the person to contact either at Enron North America Corp or the contact person for the shipper I need a response ASAP ENA agent for Counterparty Effective Date Pipeline KerrMcGee Corporation Venice Gathering Gathering System and TRANSCO Petsec Energy Inc Venice Gathering System LLC Devonian Resources Inc Somerset Gas Transmission Patrick Shipley Somerset Gas Transmission Devon Energy Corporation Reliant Energy Field Services Tenaska Gas Company TXU Gas Distribution City of Pasadena Pacific Gas Electric Company Allegheny Ludlum Corporation Columbia Gas Transmission Corporation Commonwealth Energy Inc Norse Pipeline LLC Columbia Energy Marketing Corporation TRANSCO CGAS and Dominion Transmission Inc Columbia Energy Marketing Corporation Midcoast Interstate Crescendo Energy LLC Wildhorse Energy Partners Enron Canada Corp TransCanada Pipelines Limited EPMI agent for West Fork Development Company Midwestern Gas Marketing West Fork Development Company Midwestern Gas Transmission Gleason Power I LLC ANR Pipeline Company Thanks for your assistance in this matter Marlene Hilliard

FW Nicor Hub contracts Cc We have Nicor Gas setup on the offered service table and have executed Transportation contracts The Service Type is Hub Service Service Class Interruptible I will pick up the tariff information that you have and will setup any contract per the tariff requirements Please contact me to resolve this issue as soon as possible Original Message From James Marlo C Sent Wednesday October PM To Keiser Kam Hilliard Marlene Cc Valderrama Lisa Saucier Darla Anastas Sherry Love Phillip M Campos Sylvia A Wynne Rita Mcclure Mark Kinsey Lisa Pendergrass Cora Mims Patrice L Subject Nicor Hub contracts We Vol Mgmt and Settlements are still trying to get the NicorNortherin Illinois Gas deals cleared through Unify Kam had tried to help Kathy Kelly and I last year with putting in storage tickets for the deals that address the BalancingWheeling and Loan volumes that ENA is charged by the Hub every month These volumes are coming through the Supply verifications and Sales invoices but are not being paid nor being sent out and therefore creating issues for Settlements I remember that Sylvia Campos had stated that those tickets were not possible to put in because Nicor is an Hub not a storage facility My Nicor rep faxed me copies of their tariff effective July stating they have the capacity for storage and transportation so Im a little confused what the problem is that is preventing us setting Nicor up correctly in global and Unify to handle these types of storage deals individually Any assistance with this would be greatly appreciated as we are showing a million receivable outstanding for settlements and a million payable on the service side and need to get these cleared as soon as possible I can make a copy of the tariff that I have just let me know Thanks Marlo James

FW Nicor Hub contracts Cc It has been Sylvias understanding that Nicor Gas Company is a hub which is a storage facility not the inverse We believe there has been a misinterpretation as to what has been stated In fact these contracts have been setup since Attached please find the contracts for Nicor Gas Company and Northern Illinois Gas Company These contracts have existed in the Global Contracts system Per the letter dated January Northern Illinois Gas Company changed its name to Nicor Gas Company It indicated that any existing contracts did not have to change its name to Nicor Gas Company Thus the contracts remained under the name Northern Illinois Gas Company Further these existing contracts were Parking Storage Transportation and Pooling Service Agreement We suggest that you setup deal tickets and if necessary we setup new contracts with the service of Balancing Wheeling and Loan These contracts will feed to Unify accordingly Some of the contracts already have deals which is indicated on the contract title or you can run the Sitara Report to locate the deals behind the contracts If you need our assistance please do not hesitate to contact us Thank You Marlene D Hilliard Original Message From James Marlo C Sent Thursday November AM To Pendergrass Cora Keiser Kam Hilliard Marlene Cc Valderrama Lisa Saucier Darla Anastas Sherry Love Phillip M Campos Sylvia A Wynne Rita Mcclure Mark Kinsey Lisa Mims Patrice L Wesneske Brian Subject RE Nicor Hub contracts That will be good going forward if all goes well however we still need to address the outstanding issues in order to clear the Receivables and Payables I will be giving Marlene a copy of the tariff and see if she can get contracts setup Let me know how the test goes Thanks Marlo Original Message From Pendergrass Cora Sent Thursday November AM To James Marlo C Keiser Kam Hilliard Marlene Cc Valderrama Lisa Saucier Darla Anastas Sherry Love Phillip M Campos Sylvia A Wynne Rita Mcclure Mark Kinsey Lisa Mims Patrice L Wesneske Brian Subject RE Nicor Hub contracts We are changing how we put in these tickets effective November to be on CPR exchange tickets When I get my reports for October we will go out and set up storage contracts for what we have right now and start using them accordingly Part of the problem has been in the way we have to send Nicor on an EDI process I am going to revisit and see if we can test in stage doing it thru CPR tickets and if that works then there should be no problem Please keep me posted and anything I can do to be of assistance please let me know Thanks Cora Original Message From James Marlo C Sent Wednesday October PM To Keiser Kam Hilliard Marlene Cc Valderrama Lisa Saucier Darla Anastas Sherry Love Phillip M Campos Sylvia A Wynne Rita Mcclure Mark Kinsey Lisa Pendergrass Cora Mims Patrice L Subject Nicor Hub contracts We Vol Mgmt and Settlements are still trying to get the NicorNortherin Illinois Gas deals cleared through Unify Kam had tried to help Kathy Kelly and I last year with putting in storage tickets for the deals that address the BalancingWheeling and Loan volumes that ENA is charged by the Hub every month These volumes are coming through the Supply verifications and Sales invoices but are not being paid nor being sent out and therefore creating issues for Settlements I remember that Sylvia Campos had stated that those tickets were not possible to put in because Nicor is an Hub not a storage facility My Nicor rep faxed me copies of their tariff effective July stating they have the capacity for storage and transportation so Im a little confused what the problem is that is preventing us setting Nicor up correctly in global and Unify to handle these types of storage deals individually Any assistance with this would be greatly appreciated as we are showing a million receivable outstanding for settlements and a million payable on the service side and need to get these cleared as soon as possible I can make a copy of the tariff that I have just let me know Thanks Marlo James

Oasis Cc Agreement This is Happy Netting No Paper Exist for this Agreement The notes on the Core Main Tab indicates this Parking I spoke with Sandra Grimes at Oasis Pipe Line Company and she indicated that this contract did not exist in their system They do not have any documentation Their contract nos start with she is not aware of OPLC Synthetic as their contract no Therefore the other Parking and Loan Agreements effective May are not the same contract Further the documented status confirms that no paper exist and was setup in completely I will probably terminate this contract in Global Contracts becasue it appears that it was setup in error In fact the contract does not have contracted services Should you have any further questions please do not hesitate to contact me Marlene Forwarded by Marlene HilliardHOUECT on PM Eric Gillaspie PM To Marlene ct cc Gerald CT Subject Oasis Marlene Im reviewing the amendments to the Oasis contracts that you have forwarded to me I have also completed the Assignment ENA to HPL for the following contracts ASSIGNED GAS TRANSPORTATION CONTRACTS Caption Global Contract No Effective Date Interruptible NGPA Section Gas Transportation Agreement Firm Intrastate Gas Transportation Agreement Netting Agreement confirmed only Interruptible Intrastate Gas Transportation Agreement Parking documented Interruptible NGPA Section Gas Transportation Agreement The only outstanding issue is that the Netting Agreement and the Parking Agreement are not papered In order to assign the documents they need to be papered Would you please work with Oasis to get these papered as they are the transporter It should be their paper Thanks Eric Gillaspie Enron Building

Assignment of Oasis Pipeline contracts Cc Oasis Pipeline Contracts are still being routed for signature However I received this email from Stacey Neuweiler to continue business as ENA not HPLC Thanks You Marlene Hilliard Forwarded by Marlene HilliardHOUECT on AM Stacey Neuweiler AM To Marlene ct cc Subject Assignment of Oasis Pipeline contracts Per Tom Martins request please continue business as ENA not HPLC for September Until we know the future of Houston Pipeline we will continue transacting as ENA Thank you very much for all of your help with this Stacey Neuweiler

Assignment of Oasis Pipeline contracts Cc I contacted Sandra Grimes and John Lopez Manager of Logistics of Oasis Pipe Line Company and informed them that the contracts should remain with Enron North America Corp However they have asked for an agreement or letter to disregard the assignment and assumption agreement effective September They would like to have this agreement or letter ASAP I will fax it to Atten Sandra Grimes Fax I can forward the original to Oasis Pipe Line Company on Tuesday Let me know when the agreement or letter is ready and I will route it for signatures accordingly If it cannot be ready today I will contact Sandra Grimes and John Lopez and inform them that it will be ready on Tuesday Marlene Hilliard Forwarded by Marlene HilliardHOUECT on PM Marlene Hilliard AM To Eric CT Gerald CT cc Linda S CT Sylvia A CT Subject Assignment of Oasis Pipeline contracts The Oasis Pipeline Contracts are still being routed for signature However I received this email from Stacey Neuweiler to continue business as ENA not HPLC Thank You Marlene Hilliard Forwarded by Marlene HilliardHOUECT on AM Stacey Neuweiler AM To Marlene ct cc Subject Assignment of Oasis Pipeline contracts Per Tom Martins request please continue business as ENA not HPLC for September Until we know the future of Houston Pipeline we will continue transacting as ENA Thank you very much for all of your help with this Stacey Neuweiler

Assignment of Oasis Pipeline contracts Cc Friday September I contacted Sandra Grimes and John Lopez and informed them that a letter to disregard the Assignement and Assumption Agreement would be forwarded to their offices on Tuesday September Please let me know when this letter or agreement is complete so I can route it for signature If it will not be ready today please let me know Marlene D Hilliard Forwarded by Marlene HilliardHOUECT on AM Marlene Hilliard PM To Gerald CT Eric CT cc Linda S CT Sylvia A CT Subject Assignment of Oasis Pipeline contracts Gerald I contacted Sandra Grimes and John Lopez Manager of Logistics of Oasis Pipe Line Company and informed them that the contracts should remain with Enron North America Corp However they have asked for an agreement or letter to disregard the assignment and assumption agreement effective September They would like to have this agreement or letter ASAP I will fax it to Atten Sandra Grimes Fax I can forward the original to Oasis Pipe Line Company on Tuesday Let me know when the agreement or letter is ready and I will route it for signatures accordingly If it cannot be ready today I will contact Sandra Grimes and John Lopez and inform them that it will be ready on Tuesday Marlene Hilliard Forwarded by Marlene HilliardHOUECT on PM Marlene Hilliard AM To Eric CT Gerald CT cc Linda S CT Sylvia A CT Subject Assignment of Oasis Pipeline contracts The Oasis Pipeline Contracts are still being routed for signature However I received this email from Stacey Neuweiler to continue business as ENA not HPLC Thank You Marlene Hilliard Forwarded by Marlene HilliardHOUECT on AM Stacey Neuweiler AM To Marlene ct cc Subject Assignment of Oasis Pipeline contracts Per Tom Martins request please continue business as ENA not HPLC for September Until we know the future of Houston Pipeline we will continue transacting as ENA Thank you very much for all of your help with this Stacey Neuweiler
